name: Silence in Space - Season One
description: Silence in Space is a point & click game with science fiction and horror themes. It presents the story from the standpoint of the character Alan Blake, who is a galactic mercenary who captured, on the radar of his spaceship, a spacecraft drifting in space.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Atom 1.6 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated with 64 MB RAM Storage: 50 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated with 128 MB RAM Storage: 50 MB available space
